) } const mapStateToProps = (state) =>{ return{ fetchProductList :state.productList.productList } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch =>{ return{ fetchProductDetailsList:()=> dispatch(fetchProductDetailsList()) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(ProductComponent)
